Author: phm87#7395
Content: Another idea: if there are no markets at all, a price can still be defined in OTC or a price can be calculated based on hashrate. If we add btch on a pool such as zpool.ca, miners can ask to be paid in btch and mine other cryptos. Huge problem is liquidity because pool won'tbuy coins: it sells everything to btc. Miners that ask to be paid in alts will only receive coins mined but not sold. I tested it successfully on a testpool (I prefilled the wallet).
